Description: A button with a Material Design "ink ripple" interaction effect.
Details:
This button includes an "ink ripple" effect such as described by Material Design guidelines (https://material.io/design/interaction/states.html#pressed). The ripple appears wherever the user has clicked or touched the button, and from there it grows to cover the entire button.

This component allows you to define the dimenssions of both the ripple and the ripple's background, pick an image to give them a specific color, select their opacity and configure the duration of the background and the ripple both when it's a quick press and when it's a long press.

Note: Due to limitations in how components are visualised at design-time, the opacity property only takes effect at runtime.
Title: Ripple Button
